taskDescription:
In a Venn diagram with three sets, the area where all three sets, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>A</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A</annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>B</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">B</annotation></semantics></math>, and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>C</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">C</annotation></semantics></math> overlap is equal to the set _____________.
detailedSolution:
intersection of all three sets, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>A</mi>
  <mo>∩<!-- ∩ --></mo>
  <mi>B</mi>
  <mo>∩<!-- ∩ --></mo>
  <mi>C</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A \cap B \cap C</annotation></semantics></math>
